LanguageData.PsycastNeurotrainerDescription: A one-use super-dose of mechanites which trains a specific psychic power.\n\nThe dose is administered through the orbit of the eye. Once released into the brain, the mechanites form knowledge of a specific ability, transmuting themselves into neural tissue as needed.
LanguageData.AbilityNeurotrainerUsed: {USER_labelShort} used neurotrainer to learn the {1} power.
LanguageData.Reward_RoyalFavor: whoever accepted the quest will receive {1} {0_royalFavorLabel} from {0_name}
LanguageData.Reward_RoyalFavor_ChoosePawn: you may choose one of the participating {2} to receive {1} {0_royalFavorLabel} from {0_name}
LanguageData.PsyfocusDesc: Psyfocus is a special type of mental structuring which is necessary to use psychic powers. Psyfocus dissipates over time, and must be built by regular meditation. Losing all psyfocus makes someone unable to use psychics, but has no other consequences.\n\nHigher levels of psyfocus permit higher-level powers, but also increase the rate of psyfocus dissipation
LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerAnimusStoneAndShrineAb: Per nearby animus stone {2}, nature shrine {1} (max {0})
LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerAnimusStoneAndShrine: Per nearby animus stone {3}, nature shrine {2} ({0} / {1})
LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerSculptureAbstract: Max {1} per nearby sculpture depending on quality (max {0})
LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerSculpture: Max {2} per nearby sculpture depending on quality ({0} / {1})
LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerGraveAbstract: Per nearby grave {1} if empty, {2} for human corpse (up to {0})
LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerGrave: Per nearby grave {2} if empty, {3} for human corpse ({0} / {1})
LanguageData.MeditationFocusPerFlameAbstract: {1} per nearby lit flame source (up to {0})
LanguageData.AbilityOnCooldown: ability on cooldown. It will be available in {0}.
LanguageData.AbilitySpeechTooltip: Initiate a speech from the throne. {ORGANIZER_labelShort} will go to {ORGANIZER_possessive} throne and call all colonists to listen to a speech there. If all goes well, listeners will feel inspired, and gain respect for {ORGANIZER_labelShort}. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage. The outcome depends on {ORGANIZER_labelShort}'s social abilities.
LanguageData.AbilitySpeechDisabledNoThroneUndignified: throne not usable because it is undignified.
LanguageData.BeginLinkingRitualNeedLinkSpot: Need a free, reachable spot within 3 cells for linking
LanguageData.LetterTextLinkingRitualCompleted: {PAWN_labelShort} has completed the linking ritual with {LINKABLE_labelShort}.\n\n{PAWN_pronoun} now has an upgraded psylink, permitting the use of new psychic powers.
LanguageData.BestowingCeremonyThroneroomRequirementsN: The bestower is offended that {PAWN_definite}'s throneroom does not satisfy the requirements of the title of {TITLE}. The bestowing ceremony has been cancelled.
LanguageData.ShuttleRequiredItemsNotSatisfied: Not all required cargo is loaded yet!
